description:
An authentic Roman classic. We use the heat from the freshly cooked pasta to create a silky sauce of eggs and cheese, punctuated by crispy pancetta.

Ingredients: Artisan Spaghetti, Crispy Pancetta, Pecorino Romano, Fresh Egg Yolks, Cracked Black Pepper.

Allergens: Gluten, Dairy, Eggs.

The ultimate comfort food. Our signature ragù is slow-simmered for six hours with a blend of premium meats and aromatic herbs.

Ingredients: Spaghetti, Ground Beef and Pork Blend, San Marzano Tomatoes, Mirepoix, Red Wine, Grated Parmesan.

Allergens: Gluten, Dairy, Celery.

Light, vibrant, and coastal. Succulent tiger prawns sautéed in a garlic-infused white wine sauce with a gentle spark of chili.

Ingredients: Spaghetti, Wild-Caught Shrimp, Garlic, Extra Virgin Olive Oil, White Wine, Chili Flakes, Fresh Parsley.

Allergens: Gluten, Shellfish, Sulphites.

A labor of love. Hand-layered pasta sheets with rich meat ragù and a velvety béchamel sauce, baked until the cheese is golden and bubbling.

Ingredients: Fresh Egg Pasta, Beef Ragù, Béchamel Sauce, Mozzarella, Parmesan, Fresh Basil.

Allergens: Gluten, Dairy, Eggs.
